        Returns:

        Check that the esri.toolbars.edit has been loaded
        Returns:
        boolean

      • activate

        public final void activate(Edit.ToolType tool,
            Graphic graphic)
        Activates the toolbar to edit the supplied graphic. After activation the toolbar is ready for user interaction using the specified tool.
        Parameters:
        tool - - type of tool to be used.
        graphic - - The graphic to edit.

      • activate

        public final void activate(Edit.ToolType tool,
            Graphic graphic,
            Edit.Options options)
        Activates the toolbar to edit the supplied graphic. After activation the toolbar is ready for user interaction using the specified tool.
        Parameters:
        tool - - type of tool to be used.
        graphic - - The graphic to edit.
        options - - set optional values.

      • deactivate

        public final void deactivate()
        Deactivates the toolbar. Call this method to deactivate the toolbar after editing the graphic.

      • getCurrentState

        public final Edit.EditState getCurrentState()
        Get an edit state object.
        Returns:
        EditState

      • refresh

        public final void refresh()
        Refreshes the internal state of the toolbar.

        handler - - fires when toolbar activates

        Add deactivate handler
        Parameters:
        handler - - fires when the toolbar deactivates and reactivates map navigation

      • addGraphicClickHandler

        public final void addGraphicClickHandler(ToolbarGraphicClickHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic is clicked
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when a graphic is clicked. Applicable only when the MOVE tool is active.

      • addGraphicFirstMoveHandler

        public final void addGraphicFirstMoveHandler(ToolbarGraphicFirstMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic first moves
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the user begins to move a graphic. Applicable only when the MOVE tool is active.

      • addGraphicMoveHandler

        public final void addGraphicMoveHandler(ToolbarGraphicMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic is moved
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired continuously as the graphic moves. Applicable only when the MOVE tool is active.

      • addGraphicMoveStartHandler

        public final void addGraphicMoveStartHandler(ToolbarGraphicMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when a graphic move starts
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse button is pressed down on the graphic, usually while moving a graphic. Applicable only when the MOVE tool is active.

      • addGraphicMoveStopHandler

        public final void addGraphicMoveStopHandler(ToolbarGraphicMoveStopHandler handler)
        Add handler for when a graphic move stops
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse button is released, usually after moving the graphic. Applicable only when the MOVE tool is active.

      • addRotateHandler

        public final void addRotateHandler(ToolbarRotateHandler handler)
        Add handler for when a graphic is rotated
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires continuously as a graphic is rotated.

      • addRotateFirstMoveHandler

        public final void addRotateFirstMoveHandler(ToolbarRotateFirstMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic is first rotated
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the user begins to drag a handle to rotate the graphic.

      • addRotateStartHandler

        public final void addRotateStartHandler(ToolbarRotateStartHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic rotation is started
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when a user clicks on the handle to begin rotating a graphic.

      • addRotateStopHandler

        public final void addRotateStopHandler(ToolbarRotateStopHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic stops rotating
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the mouse button is released from the rotate handle to finish rotating the graphic.

      • addScaleHandler

        public final void addScaleHandler(ToolbarScaleHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic is scaled
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires continuously as the graphic is being scaled.

      • addScaleFirstMoveHandler

        public final void addScaleFirstMoveHandler(ToolbarScaleFirstMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic is first moved
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the user begins to drag a handle to scale the graphic.

      • addScaleStartHandler

        public final void addScaleStartHandler(ToolbarScaleStartHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic starts being scaled
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when a user clicks on the handle to scale or resize a graphic.

      • addScaleStopHandler

        public final void addScaleStopHandler(ToolbarScaleStopHandler handler)
        Add handler for when graphic stops being scaled
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the mouse button is released from the scale handle to finish scaling the graphic.

      • addVertexAddHandler

        public final void addVertexAddHandler(ToolbarVertexAddHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is added
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired after a new vertex is added to a polyline or polygon or a new point is added to a multipoint. Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexClickHandler

        public final void addVertexClickHandler(ToolbarVertexClickHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is clicked
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse button is clicked on the vertex of a polyline or polygon or a point in a multipoint. Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexDeleteHandler

        public final void addVertexDeleteHandler(ToolbarVertexDeleteHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is deleted
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired after a vertex(polyline, polygon) or point(multipoint) is deleted. Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexFirstMoveHandler

        public final void addVertexFirstMoveHandler(ToolbarVertexFirstMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is first moved.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the user begins to move the vertex of a polyline or polygon or a point of a multipoint. Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexMouseOutHandler

        public final void addVertexMouseOutHandler(ToolbarVertexMouseOutHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is first moved.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires as the mouse exits a vertex(polyline, polygon) or a point(multipoint). Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexMouseOverHandler

        public final void addVertexMouseOverHandler(ToolbarVertexMouseOverHandler handler)
        Add handler for when mouse is over vertex.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse moves over a vertex (polyline, polygon) or point (multipoint). Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexMoveHandler

        public final void addVertexMoveHandler(ToolbarVertexMoveHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex is moved
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired continuously as the user is moving a vertex (polyline, polygon) or point (multipoint). Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexMoveStartHandler

        public final void addVertexMoveStartHandler(ToolbarVertexMoveStartHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex starts moving
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse button is pressed down on a vertex (polyline, polygon) or point (multipoint). Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.

      • addVertexMoveEndHandler

        public final void addVertexMoveEndHandler(ToolbarVertexMoveEndHandler handler)
        Add handler for when vertex stops moving
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fired when the mouse button is released from a vertex (polyline, polygon) or point(multipoint). Applicable only when the EDIT_VERTICES tool is active.
